description: This file defines a React functional component named TopNav, which renders the top navigation bar of the web application. The component includes theme toggling, page title, menu button, and sign-out functionality when a user is authenticated.

methods.name: TopNav({ title = "Home", onMenu })
methods.description: React component rendering header with theme toggle, title, menu button, and sign out option.

methods.name: toggleTheme
methods.description: Function to toggle the theme between 'light' and 'dark'.

methods.name: onSignOut
methods.description: Async function to handle user sign-out.
